parametrized_description: A dog school trains NumDogTypes different dog types to deliver newspapers. Each dog type delivers NewspapersPerService newspapers per service and requires TreatsPerService small bone treats per service. The total number of small bone treats available is TotalBoneTreatsAvailable. At least MinGoldenRetrievers golden retrievers must be used, and at most MaxPercentageLabradors of the dogs can be labradors. The goal is to maximize the number of newspapers delivered.

NumDogTypes.description: Number of different dog types used in the school

NewspapersPerService.description: Number of newspapers delivered per service by each dog type

TreatsPerService.description: Number of small bone treats required per service by each dog type

TotalBoneTreatsAvailable.description: Total number of small bone treats available

MinGoldenRetrievers.description: Minimum number of golden retrievers to be used

MaxPercentageLabradors.description: Maximum percentage of dogs that can be labradors

ServicesDelivered.description: The number of services delivered by each dog type

NumGoldenRetrievers.description: The number of golden retrievers used

constraints.description: The total number of small bone treats required by all dog types cannot exceed TotalBoneTreatsAvailable.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(TreatsPerService[d] * ServicesDelivered[d] for d in range(NumDogTypes)) <= TotalBoneTreatsAvailable)

constraints.description: At least MinGoldenRetrievers golden retrievers must be used.
No more than MaxPercentageLabradors of the total number of dogs can be labradors.

objective.description: Maximize the total number of newspapers delivered by the dog school while adhering to constraints on treat availability, minimum golden retrievers, and the proportion of labradors.

code.gurobipy: model.setObjective(quicksum(ServicesDelivered[i] * NewspapersPerService[i] for i in range(NumDogTypes)), GRB.MAXIMIZE)
